Types

tItem

TYPE tItem RECORD <anonymous wc_treecordion R3>
    
id STRING
key STRING
text STRING
image STRING
iconOpen STRING
iconClosed STRING
state STRING
content STRING
END RECORD

tTreeCordion

TYPE tTreeCordion RECORD <anonymous wc_treecordion R1>
    
id STRING
field STRING
title STRING
narrative STRING
imagePath STRING
iconOpen STRING
iconClosed STRING
doc om.DomDocument
dom om.DomNode
Id_New FUNCTION (p_id:STRING) RETURNS STRING
END RECORD

Functions

Clear

FUNCTION Clear(r_tree tTreeCordion)

Clear record: reset attributes on root node, and delete all children

 define r_acc wc_treecordion.tTreeCordion
 call wc_treecordion.Clear(r_acc.*)

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance

Collapse

FUNCTION Collapse(r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id STRING)

Collapse node, default is root node (all)

 define r_acc tTreeCordion
 call wc_treecordion.Collapse(r_acc.*, "1")

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_id - Node ID

Create

FUNCTION Create(p_field STRING) RETURNS tTreeCordion

Creates a new instance of TreeCordion

 define r_acc wc_treecordion.tTreeCordion
 call wc_treecordion.Create("formonly.p_treecordion") returning r_acc.*

Parameters:
p_field - Form name of the field
Returns:
TreeCordion record

 define r_acc tTreeCordion
 call wc_treecordion.Expand(r_acc.*, "1")

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_id - Node ID

Init

FUNCTION Init()

Initialize the widget

 call wc_actree.Init()

IsVisible

FUNCTION IsVisible(r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id STRING) RETURNS boolean

Is contents of node visible?

 define r_acc tTreeCordion
 if wc_treecordion.IsVisible(r_acc.*, "2")
 then
   message "contents of item 2 is visible"
 end if

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_id - Node ID
Returns:
TRUE if visible, else FALSE

Item_Add

FUNCTION Item_Add(r_tree tTreeCordion, p_parentId STRING, p_id STRING, p_key STRING, p_text STRING, p_image STRING, p_iconOpen STRING, p_iconClosed STRING, p_state STRING, p_content STRING) RETURNS om.DomNode

Add a child Item to a parent Item

 define  r_tree tTreeCordion, p_parentId, p_id integer
 call wc_treecordion.Item_Add(r_tree.*, p_parentId, p_id:=p_id+1, "", "Section A", "ActivityMonitor-16.png", "", "", "closed", "This is content for <B>A</B> section")

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_parentId - Parent Item ID
p_id - Item ID
p_key - Alternate key
p_text - Text attribute
p_image - Image attribute
p_iconOpen - Icon for Open state
p_iconClosed - Icon for Closed state
p_state - Initial state of node (NOT CURRENTLY USED)
p_content - Content for this node
Returns:
DOM node of added child

Item_Delete

FUNCTION Item_Delete(r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id STRING) RETURNS STRING

Delete an Item and its descendents by ID

 define  r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id integer
 call wc_treecordion.Item_Add(r_tree.*, p_parentId, p_id:=p_id+1, "Section A", "ActivityMonitor-16.png", "", "", "closed", "This is content for <B>A</B> section")

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_id - Item ID

Item_Get

FUNCTION Item_Get(r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id STRING) RETURNS tItem

Get an Item by ID

 define  r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id integer
 call wc_treecordion.Item_Get(r_tree.*, p_id)

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_id - Item ID
Returns:
Record of the item node

Item_Update

FUNCTION Item_Update(r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id STRING, p_key STRING, p_text STRING, p_image STRING, p_iconOpen STRING, p_iconClosed STRING, p_state STRING, p_content STRING) RETURNS om.DomNode

Update attributes of an Item

n DOM node of added child

define r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id integer call wc_treecordion.Item_Update(r_tree.*, p_id, "SecA", "Section A", "ActivityMonitor-16.png", "", "", "closed", "This is content for <B>A</B> section")

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_id - Item ID
p_key - Alternate key
p_text - Text attribute
p_image - Image attribute
p_iconOpen - Icon for Open state
p_iconClosed - Icon for Closed state
p_state - Initial state of node (NOT CURRENTLY USED)
p_content - Content for this node
Returns:
DOM node of added child

Node

FUNCTION Node(r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id STRING) RETURNS om.DomNode

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_id - Item ID
Returns:
DOM node of added child

Node_Add

FUNCTION Node_Add(o_parent om.DomNode, p_id STRING, p_key STRING, p_text STRING, p_image STRING, p_iconOpen STRING, p_iconClosed STRING, p_state STRING, p_content STRING) RETURNS om.DomNode

Add a child node to a parent node

 define  a_nodes dynamic array of om.DomNode,
 let a_nodes[p_depth] = wc_treecordion.Node_Add(a_nodes[p_depth-1], p_id:=p_id+1, "Section A", "ActivityMonitor-16.png", "", "", "closed", "This is content for <B>A</B> section")

Parameters:
o_parent - Parent DOM node
p_id - Node ID
p_key - Alternate key
p_text - Text attribute
p_image - Image attribute
p_iconOpen - Icon for Open state
p_iconClosed - Icon for Closed state
p_state - Current state of node (NOT CURRENTLY USED)
p_content - Content for this node
Returns:
DOM node of added child

Node_Set

FUNCTION Node_Set(o_node om.DomNode, p_id STRING, p_key STRING, p_text STRING, p_image STRING, p_iconOpen STRING, p_iconClosed STRING, p_state STRING, p_content STRING)

 define  o_parent, o_child om.DomNode
 let o_child = o_parent.createChild("Node")
 call Node_Set(o_child, p_id, p_key, p_text, p_image, p_iconOpen, p_iconClosed, p_state, p_content)

Parameters:
o_node -
p_id - Node ID
p_key - Alternate key
p_text - Text attribute
p_image - Image attribute
p_iconOpen - Icon for Open state
p_iconClosed - Icon for Closed state
p_state - Current state of node (NOT CURRENTLY USED)
p_content - Content for this node

Set

FUNCTION Set(r_tree tTreeCordion)

Set initial contents of widget

 define r_acc tTreeCordion
 let r_acc.title = "Title"
 ...
 call wc_treecordion.Set(r_acc.*)

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance

Show

FUNCTION Show(r_tree tTreeCordion, p_id STRING, p_show BOOLEAN)

Show or hide a node

 define r_acc tTreeCordion
 call wc_treecordion.Show(r_acc.*, "1", TRUE)

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
p_id - Node ID
p_show - TRUE to show, else hide

XML

FUNCTION XML(r_tree tTreeCordion) RETURNS STRING

Get XML string from document

 define p_xml string,
   r_acc tTreeCordion
 let p_xml = wc_treecordion.XML(r_acc.*)

Parameters:
r_tree - TreeCordion instance
